text: Edamon is a village in Punalur taluk in Kollam district in the state of Kerala, India. ==Demographics== India census, Edamon had a population of 12453 with 5980 males and 6473 females. The population has reduced to 12,029 with 5,652 males (47%) and 6,377 females (53%) as per the survey of census during 2011 by Indian Government.http://www.censusindia.gov.in/pca/SearchDetails.aspx?Id=679087 ==References== Category:Villages in Kollam district
title: Edamon
